greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: exp(Sum_{k>=1} B(x^k)/k), where B(x) = x + 2*x^2 + 5*x^3 + 14*x^4 + 42*x^5 + ... = (C(x)-1)/x and C is the g.f. for the Catalan numbers A000108.
comment: a(n) is the number of forests of rooted plane binary trees (each node has outdegree = 0 or 2) where the trees have a total of n internal nodes.  Cf. A222006. - _Geoffrey Critzer_, Feb 26 2013
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: Euler transform of Catalan numbers (A000108). - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Mar 01 2006
program: print([b(n) for n in range(30)]) # _Peter Luschny_, Nov 11 2020
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 06 2003
